pos review: Top Location and very friendly. They've been preparing a lunch package because I had to leave early.
Clean rooms, young and friendly atmosphere, nice personnel at the reception.
Hostel not too far from train station. Good staff even I check in at 1am. Bed was soft.
neg review: It's always lound. I always heard people walking around close the door and open the door whole night. I can't even sleep. Shower room and toilet at my floor are broken can't use it.

pos review: People  - staff  :) really nice and helpfull!
neg review: Too loud. Not so clean. Shower were broken (3 showers, two broken, one mens oki) on the one floor! (a lot of rooms)

pos review: The hostel was 10 minutes walking from Brussels Central. Breakfast was very good and there was variety. Friendly service. There was also a room where you could leave your luggage and pick them later.
Staff were more than expected, very helpful and cheering, special thanks to Doppy and the reception lady, unfortunately i don't know her name to thank her
neg review: There is no shared kitchen, no gathering time
